Lowrey Global Consultants

Our Business

We provide structured lessons to optimize students' learning opportunity. Our program is centered around a communicative approach with focused study balanced with communicative study. Our courses are catered to the students' needs or the company's targets. Being on site also gives me the opportunity to work closely with the students to adjust the schedules to everyone's convenience while facilitating their natural English. On top of these benefits of having a language influencer on site I am also able to lend an international atmosphere to the office as well as engage students in natural settings, for instance at the copy machine or over Line. On top of this companies can avoid problems caused by technical issues during online lessons.

Our Services

Corporate English Lessons

Just as every organization is unique in the way it does business, the language training program that each corporation requires needs to be tailor-made. Drawing on a long history of working with companies, I am equipped to work together with our customers to make sure the key areas of need are addressed. Meetings, presentations, description of production process, preparation for overseas transfer and business trips are some areas in which my experience means that I can address these vital skills head on.

TOEIC Intensive

Working to step up your staff's TOEIC levels? We can work together through skill practice, advice and practical exercises designed to build on grammar, vocabulary and listening skills that are important for improving your TOEIC ability. The best balance of self-study and review with a focused practice with your teacher can help you fulfill your test targets.

Sign & Slogan Check

Signs are often placed across Japan with grammatical errors or incorrect word choice. Help polish up your professional image by having more accurate signs that will catch the attention of your international customers. We will proofread your English for a low cost and offer you a couple of alternatives from which you may also choose. If you want to get started, contact us with your needs and we give you a quotation. We can also offer this service for t-shirt slogans and restaurant menus.

Todd Lowrey

I am a dedicated and experienced instructor, holding punctuality and diligence as important in conducting all aspects of the English classes. That being said, students grow by enjoyment of English and we ensure that the balance we set in class fosters this. There has been a trend towards more online study recently which has advantages but also holds some disadvantages and drop off in quality. Getting back into a classroom with an immersive teaching environment opens a more 3-D and interconnected approach to study. I have experience of over 18 years teaching chiefly business English including many Hamamatsu area musical instrument makers and automotive industry companies. My recent inside-company experience of four and a half years plus working in sales has given me more insight into the areas that need to be taught which helps me approach each class even more professionally.

Contact Us

Use this form to send us a sign you would like to check or to inquire about your language training needs. We will get back to you within 1 business day.
